sentence: Vulnerable Democrat Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ) trails a generic Republican in Arizona’s Senate race, according to a poll from OHPredictive Insights released this past week.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Poll: Democrat Mark Kelly Trails Generic Republican in AZ Senate Race

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
author: Camila Pedrosa
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers – Cronkite News

sentence: Recommended: Lefties in Panic Over Biden Support Collapse With Younger Voters My colleague and dear friend Stephen Kruiser — an Arizona native and Tucson resident — just doesn’t see any Republican knocking off Mark Kelly.
author: Stephen Green
title: Sabato: Republicans 'Favorites' to Take Senate
